name: Leap (Adam Elaoud)
description:
Infinite Runner with abilities!

Leap and bound your way across valleys and over hills  as you try to become the best runner!

Watch out! You must sacrifice your lives  to gain abilities.

How far can you make it as the game continues to speed up  ?

Write your best time in the comments (my best was 8123  )!

Controls:
  • Press/Hold SPACE to jump!
  • R to restart
  • ESC/P to pause
  • SHIFT to slo-mo
Power Ups:
  • Slo-Mo (slow down time for 1 second)
  • Double Jump
  • Glide (hold space to glide)
  • Platform Squish (make platforms spawn closer together)!
Known Bugs:
  • Occassionally, the first platform will be unreachable, if this happens, just reset the level (Press ‘R’)
  • Very very very rarely, the upgrade system will cause a crash (this is being worked on)
